thread.title: Score 2 FREE Bowling Games Per Child ALL Summer Long (Registration Starts Now for Some Locations)
thread.title_full: Score 2 FREE Bowling Games Per Child ALL Summer Long (Registration Starts Now for Some Locations)

author: Erica (Silly Sidekick)
title: Score 2 FREE Bowling Games Per Child ALL Summer Long (Registration Starts Now for Some Locations)
text:
Looking for something fun to do this summer? Hop on over here to sign up for the Kids’ Bowl Free Program where registered Kids will receive 2 FREE Bowling Games everyday, all summer long (valued at over $500 per child)! Please note that dates will vary depending on your location, but dates will start as early as April 1st.

Interested? Follow these simple steps: STEP #1: Go HERE .
STEP #2: Enter your state and select your nearest participating location.
STEP #3: Register EACH Child by filling out the form. Note that some locations are not available to register as of yet, but you can sign up to be notified when registration will be available by providing your email address.
STEP #4: By registering, you’ll receive coupons via email each week throughout the summer (each child will get 2 free games, per day).
STEP #5: Redeem by showing them on your smartphone or printing them.
STEP #6… Have FUN!
